verses.verse: Likewise this is the Torah <S%H8451><s%> of the trespass offering <S%H817><s%>: it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%>.

In the place <S%H4725><s%> where they kill <S%H7819><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> shall they kill <S%H7819><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the trespass offering <S%H817><s%>: and the blood <S%H1818><s%> thereof shall he sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> <S%H8799><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8686><s%> of it all the fat <S%H2459><s%> thereof; the rump <S%H451><s%>, and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that covereth <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8764><s%> the inwards <S%H7130><s%>,

And the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys <S%H3629><s%>, and the fat <S%H2459><s%> that is on them, which is by the flanks <S%H3689><s%>, and the caul <S%H3508><s%> that is above the liver <S%H3516><s%>, with the kidneys <S%H3629><s%>, it shall he take away <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8686><s%>:

And the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them upon the altar <S%H4196><s%> for an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>: it is a trespass offering <S%H817><s%>.

Havahry male <S%H2145><s%> among the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thereof: it shall be eaten <S%H398><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in the holy <S%H6918><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>: it is most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%>.

As the sin offering <S%H2403><s%> is, so is the trespass offering <S%H817><s%>: there is one <S%H259><s%> Torah <S%H8451><s%> for them: the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> that maketh atonement <S%H3722><s%> <S%H8762><s%> therewith shall have it.

And the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> that offereth <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8688><s%> any man's <S%H376><s%> burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, even the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall have to himself the skin <S%H5785><s%> of the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> which he hath offered <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8689><s%>.

And all the meat offering <S%H4503><s%> that is baken <S%H644><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in the oven <S%H8574><s%>, and all that is dressed <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8738><s%> in the fryingpan <S%H4802><s%>, and in the pan <S%H4227><s%>, shall be the Kohen's <S%H3548><s%> that offereth <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8688><s%> it.

And every meat offering <S%H4503><s%>, mingled <S%H1101><s%> <S%H8803><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, and dry <S%H2720><s%>, shall all the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aharon <S%H175><s%> have, one <S%H376><s%> as much as another <S%H251><s%>.
And this is the Torah <S%H8451><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>, which he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8686><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

If he offer <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it for a thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%>, then he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8689><s%> with the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> cakes <S%H2471><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> <S%H8803><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, and unleavened <S%H4682><s%> wafers <S%H7550><s%> anointed <S%H4886><s%> <S%H8803><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, and cakes <S%H2471><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> <S%H8803><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, of fine flour <S%H5560><s%>, fried <S%H7246><s%> <S%H8716><s%>.

Besides the cakes <S%H2471><s%>, he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8686><s%> for his offering <S%H7133><s%> leavened <S%H2557><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> with the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%> of his peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>.

And of it he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8689><s%> one <S%H259><s%> out of the whole oblation <S%H7133><s%> for an heave offering <S%H8641><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and it shall be the Kohen's <S%H3548><s%> that sprinkleth <S%H2236><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>.

And the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of his peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> for thanksgiving <S%H8426><s%> shall be eaten <S%H398><s%> <S%H8735><s%> the same day <S%H3117><s%> that it is offered <S%H7133><s%>; he shall not leave <S%H3240><s%> <S%H8686><s%> any of it until the morning <S%H1242><s%>.

But if the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of his offering <S%H7133><s%> be a vow <S%H5088><s%>, or a voluntary offering <S%H5071><s%>, it shall be eaten <S%H398><s%> <S%H8735><s%> the same day <S%H3117><s%> that he offereth <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8687><s%> his sacrifice <S%H2077><s%>: and on the morrow <S%H4283><s%> also the remainder <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8737><s%> of it shall be eaten <S%H398><s%> <S%H8735><s%>:

But the remainder <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8737><s%> of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> on the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be burnt <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8735><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>.

And if any of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of his peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> be eaten <S%H398><s%> <S%H8735><s%> at all <S%H398><s%> <S%H8736><s%> on the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, it shall not be accepted <S%H7521><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, neither shall it be imputed <S%H2803><s%> <S%H8735><s%> unto him that offereth <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8688><s%> it: it shall be an abomination <S%H6292><s%>, and the soul <S%H5315><s%> that eateth <S%H398><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of it shall bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.

And the flesh <S%H1320><s%> that toucheth <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8799><s%> any unclean <S%H2931><s%> thing shall not be eaten <S%H398><s%> <S%H8735><s%>; it shall be burnt <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8735><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>: and as for the flesh <S%H1320><s%>, all that be clean <S%H2889><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thereof.

But the soul <S%H5315><s%> that eateth <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>, that pertain unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, having his uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> upon him, even that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8738><s%> from his people <S%H5971><s%>.

Moreover the soul <S%H5315><s%> that shall touch <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8799><s%> any unclean <S%H2932><s%> thing, as the uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, or any unclean <S%H2931><s%> beast <S%H929><s%>, or any abominable <S%H8263><s%> unclean <S%H2931><s%> thing, and eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>, which pertain unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, even that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8738><s%> from his people <S%H5971><s%>.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> no manner of fat <S%H2459><s%>, of ox <S%H7794><s%>, or of sheep <S%H3775><s%>, or of goat <S%H5795><s%>.

And the fat <S%H2459><s%> of the beast that dieth of itself <S%H5038><s%>, and the fat <S%H2459><s%> of that which is torn with beasts <S%H2966><s%>, may be used <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in any other use <S%H4399><s%>: but ye shall in no wise <S%H398><s%> <S%H8800><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of it.

For whosoever eateth <S%H398><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> of the beast <S%H929><s%>, of which men offer <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8686><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, even the soul <S%H5315><s%> that eateth <S%H398><s%> <S%H8802><s%> it shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8738><s%> from his people <S%H5971><s%>.
Moreover ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> no manner of blood <S%H1818><s%>, whether it be of fowl <S%H5775><s%> or of beast <S%H929><s%>, in any of your dwellings <S%H4186><s%>.

Whatsoever soul <S%H5315><s%> it be that eateth <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> any manner <S%H3605><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%>, even that soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8738><s%> from his people <S%H5971><s%>.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, He that offereth <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8688><s%> the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of his peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> his oblation <S%H7133><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of his peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>.

His own hands <S%H3027><s%> shall bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the offerings <S%H801><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%>, the fat <S%H2459><s%> with the breast <S%H2373><s%>, it shall he bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, that the breast <S%H2373><s%> may be waved <S%H5130><s%> <S%H8687><s%> for a wave offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>: but the breast <S%H2373><s%> shall be Aharon's <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> '.

And the right <S%H3225><s%> shoulder <S%H7785><s%> shall ye give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> for an heave offering <S%H8641><s%> of the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of your peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>.

He among the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aharon <S%H175><s%>, that offereth <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8688><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>, and the fat <S%H2459><s%>, shall have the right <S%H3225><s%> shoulder <S%H7785><s%> for his part <S%H4490><s%>.

For the wave <S%H8573><s%> breast <S%H2373><s%> and the heave <S%H8641><s%> shoulder <S%H7785><s%> have I taken <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> from off the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of their peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>, and have given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them unto Aharon <S%H175><s%> the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> and unto his sons <S%H1121><s%> by a statute <S%H2706><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> from among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

This is the portion of the anointing <S%H4888><s%> of Aharon <S%H175><s%>, and of the anointing <S%H4888><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%>, out of the offerings <S%H801><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%>, in the day <S%H3117><s%> when he presented <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them to minister unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> in the Kohen's office <S%H3547><s%> <S%H8763><s%>;

Which the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> to be given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> them of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he anointed <S%H4886><s%> <S%H8800><s%> them, by a statute <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> throughout their generations <S%H1755><s%>.

This is the Torah <S%H8451><s%> of the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, of the meat offering <S%H4503><s%>, and of the sin offering <S%H2403><s%>, and of the trespass offering <S%H817><s%>, and of the consecrations <S%H4394><s%>, and of the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of the peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>;

Which the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%>, in the day <S%H3117><s%> that he commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8763><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> to offer <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8687><s%> their oblations <S%H7133><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai <S%H5514><s%>.
